mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (ID, PW, NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, ADDRESS) VALUES (#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{address})
INSERT INTO MEMBER_ROLE (ID, ROLENUM) VALUES (#{id},(SELECT ROLENUM FROM "ROLE" r WHERE r.ROLENAME = 'MEMBER'))
mapper.select: SELECT ID FROM MEMBER WHERE ID = #{id} AND PW = #{pw}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET name = #{name} , phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, address = #{address} WHERE id = #{id}
